defaultProfileDescription: Switch the primary profile that is used for scanning.
editingProfileDescription: Change which profile is being modified on this page.
languageDescription: The language you are reading with this profile
localeDescription: The language the interface will be displayed in
deinflectionSourceDescription: Deinflect via algorithm or dictionary lookup.
posFilteringDescription: Filter algorithm deinflections using part of speech tags.
storageUseInvalid: Yezichak is using an indeterminate amount of storage.
persistentStorageDescription: Enable to help prevent the browser from unexpectedly clearing the database.
persistentStorageDescriptionMore: Web browsers will sometimes clear stored data if the device is running low on storage space. This can result in the imported dictionaries being deleted unexpectedly, causing Yezichak to stop functioning. Enabling persistent storage tells the browser that the data should not be deleted in those circumstances.
invalidStorageFirefoxNote1: On Firefox and Firefox for Android, the storage information feature may be hidden behind a browser flag. To enable this flag, open
invalidStorageFirefoxNote4: should allow storage information to be calculated.
storageFirefoxMobileNote: It may not be possible to enable Persistent Storage on Firefox for Android.
storageChromiumNote1: Chromium-based browsers should not need to enable this setting since the Yezichak extension has the
storageChromiumNot2: permission, which should prevent data deletion.
freqSortDescription: Sort results using a frequency dictionary.
freqSortDescriptionMore: Enabling this option will sort search results using a specific dictionary. This can be beneficial when using multiple dictionaries which may not have consistent sorting information.
scanKeyDescription: Hold a key while moving the cursor to scan text.
hidePopupOnCursorExitDescription: When the cursor exits the popup, the popup will be hidden.
themeDescription: Adjust the style of the popup.
actionBarAppearanceDescription: Control when and where the action bar is visible.
changePopupLayout: Change the layout of the popup.
scaleDescription: Control the scaling factor of the popup.
sizeDescription: Control the size of the window, in pixels.
enableAudioDescription: Show a clickable speaker icon next to search results.
clipboard.enableBackgroundMonitorDescrip: Open the search page in a new window when the clipboard contains text.
clipboard.enableSearchPageMonitor: Enable search page clipboard text monitoring
clipboard.enableSearchPageMonitorDescrip: The query on the search page will be automatically updated with text in the clipboard.
settingsBackupExplanation: Yezichak can import and export settings files which can be used to restore settings, share settings across devices, and to help to debug problems. These files will only contain settings and will not contain dictionaries. Dictionaries must be imported separately. However, you can also import a previously exported collection of dictionaries. See the next section about that.
dictionaryExportExplanation: You can try to export the entire collection of your dictionaries into a single large file that you can try to import from other browsers or devices. Importing the collection like that is a destructive operation and will replace your current database of dictionaries so please proceed with caution. These operations can take a lot of time depending on the size of your collection, especially at the start and at the end, so have patience.
yomichanExport2: for instructions to export your data from older Yomichan installations.
